production._description: Whether or not the forum is in a production environment or not

databaseSetupNeeded._description: Whether or not a database needs to be created for development

loadMockData._description: Whether or not mock data should be loaded into the database

port._description: The port the forum should run on (i.e. http://localhost:PORT_NUMBER)

SQL.Trace._description: Whether or not to log all SQL transations made by the server
